core:action.core:comment: Accumulate a list of privileges, any one of which would allow the user to proceed

core:assignAction.core:comment: Accumulate the limit that this user currently has for information

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: User already has this privilege and this is enough to cover the limit

core:assignAction.core:comment: Accumulate the maximum limit that is possible if the user had all funciton authorisation

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: If the user had this privilege, they could proceed

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Get authorisation for one or more of the accumulated privileges

core:assignAction.core:comment: If user is not set as remain active then authorisingUser will be null and savedAuthorisingUser will contain the user that actually authorised the action.

core:eventLink.core:comment: No limit is great enough to authorise this amount
